basic.description: This course covers polynomial, trigonometric, exponential, and logarithmic functions; first and second derivatives and their interpretations; definition and interpretation of the integral; differentiation rules; implicit differentiation; applications of the derivative; anti-derivatives; fundamental theorem of calculus. This course must be taken for reduced credit by students with prior credit for some of the content.
basic.subject: MAC
basic.title: Calculus with Analytic Geometry I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 1147; or MAC 1140 and MAC 1114; or suitable mathematics examination placement score.
